com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load
Class LzoTokenizedLoader

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.pig.builtin.Utf8StorageConverter
      com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load.LzoBaseLoadFunc
          com.twitter.elephantbird.pig.load.LzoTokenizedLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.pig.LoadFunc, org.apache.pig.SamplableLoader, org.apache.pig.Slicer
public class LzoTokenizedLoader
extends LzoBaseLoadFunc
implements org.apache.pig.SamplableLoader

A load function that parses a line of input into fields using a delimiter to set the fields. The delimiter is given as a single character, \t, or \x___ or slash u___.

Constructor Detail

LzoTokenizedLoader

public LzoTokenizedLoader(java.lang.String delimiter)
Constructs a Pig loader that uses specified character as a field delimiter.

Parameters:
delimiter - the single byte character that is used to separate fields. examples are ':', '\t', or ''
Method Detail

skipToNextSyncPoint

public void skipToNextSyncPoint(boolean atFirstRecord)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from class: LzoBaseLoadFunc
Override to do any special syncing for moving to the right point of a new input split.

Specified by:
skipToNextSyncPoint in class LzoBaseLoadFunc
Parameters:
atFirstRecord - whether or not this is the first record in the file. Typically for line-based readers, for example, we want to skip to the next new line at the beginning of an input split because the arbitrary byte offset we're at generally puts us in the middle of a line. We count on the previous input split to read slightly beyond its offset to the end of the next line to account for this. However, this doesn't hold for the very first record in the file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getNext

public org.apache.pig.data.Tuple getNext()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Break the next line into a delimited set of fields. Note that this can and does result in tuples with different numbers of fields, which is tracked by a counter.

Specified by:
getNext in interface org.apache.pig.LoadFunc
Throws:
java.io.IOException
